China’s largest-ever military drills aren’t just about Taiwan. They’re testing blockades, long-range strikes, and deterrence against the US and its allies. From hypersonic missiles to weaponized civilian ships and nuclear expansion, Beijing is preparing for a multi-front conflict. “Justice Mission 2025” isn’t posturing—it’s rehearsal.

title: China Has Surrounded Taiwan. War Is Coming
